umm.....the People's Base is entirely underground......
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wed=
nesday, May 31, 2000 4:27 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Wrath and K=
amodia nod* Wrath: Okay, Let's go. *Wrath and Kamodia walk out of the Peopl=
e's Base and go looking for new members*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, May 31,=
 2000 1:15 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "well, there could be o=
thers, but sadly, we don't have much in our group...." Dracona said.... "yo=
u could go out with me to look for more members, though.." Dracona said to =
Wrath and Kamodia.....
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilov=
ealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2=
000 12:04 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Wrath stared confus=
ed and Kamodia smiled and waved back* Wrath: Well, What should we do first?=
 Any missions that done? Kamodia: Any other bots I can meet? *Kamodia said =
hoping Dracona said yes*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From=
: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2=
000 6:39 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        "now that your wi=
th us, understand that we don't fight Maximals, we only fight Alliance and =
sometimes the Predacons, we're in this to end this war...." Dracona pointed=
 out.. "i'm Dracona, that's Plintissa, she's talking to the core consiousne=
ss of Suukie, and those are the Radicons, Stranato, Arrow, Stronghold, Airb=
omber, Scamrock, and Train Wreck...." Dracona pointed out....The Radicons s=
topped strangling each other and waved to Wrath and Kamodia......
         =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:27 PM
      =
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Wrath Kamodia payed very much =
attention to everything Dracona showed them*
            ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
            Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:21 PM
            Subject: Re: Ne=
o Beast Wars


            Dracona smiled... "great, we needed members..the=
 radicons looked at each other angily....with one punch Scamrock knocked do=
wn Arrow, but dracona stopped the fight quickly......Dracona pointed out th=
e secrets of the base to Wrath and Kamodia, like the secret passagewaay and=
 stuff.....
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From:=
 ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent:=
 Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:15 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
              *Wrath and Kamodia begin walking around looking at all the CR=
 Chamber's and Computer's* Kamodia: Well, I seem to like it. Wrath: It didn=
't take us too long to get in here. *They both turned to Dracona* Kamodia: =
I wish to join. Wrath: Count me in for that.
                ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:30 PM
           =
     Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                "yes, you can join us, t=
he People's Group!..." Dracona said..... "come on, we'll show you, but prom=
ise not to ever let this slip out......" Dracona said.....Dracona put a bli=
ndfold on Wrath and Kamodia and (with Orchid's permission only, if Orchid d=
oesn't like this then it doesn't have to happen, just wanted to quicken thi=
ngs...) took them through the secret passageway..... "thiss is the base....=
it's all underground...." Dracona said, removing the blindfolds from Wrath =
and Kamodia.....
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
          =
        From: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
                Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:36 AM
                  Subje=
ct: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  *Wrath and Kamodia turned to loo=
k* Wrath: Do you know where we can get a job? *Wrath asked to Dracona* *Wra=
th said as he and Kamodia walked up to Dracona* *Kamodia smiled as she got =
her wish of meeting some more bots*
                    ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:24 AM
    =
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    Dracona a=
nd company finishe repairing all except for suukie, wgo was injured too bad=
 and would take a long time to repair..Plintissa, much to Dracona's anger, =
had forgotten about their mission and stayed to talk to Suukie....the Radic=
ons and Dracona came from the secret passage way when nobody could possibly=
 see, and walked off searching for some members......the Radicons bickered =
among themselves and Dracona studied the landscape..Dracona saw Wrath and K=
amodia.. "hey, you 2, over here!..." Dracona said, calling out Wrath and Ka=
modia......the Radicons drew their blasters and stood guard, Scamrock laugh=
ed and played with his thumbs......Dracona showed her hands empty to show t=
hat she came in peace....she waved to Wrath and Kamodia.....
              =
        ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: ilovealll=
izards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                     =
 Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 9:12 PM
                      Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


                      *Kamodia thought she saw something for a=
 minute but figures its all in her mond continues walking on*
             =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: THEC=
ODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      =
  Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
                        Subject: Re: N=
eo Beast Wars


                        Plintissa looks in the distance and=
 spots Wrath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be good for the Peopl=
e's Group, but no wway she could invite them with these idiot Truths surrou=
nding her!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping they'll see......
 =
                         ----- Original Message ----- 
                    =
      From: ilovealllizards 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
                          Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 2:15 AM
          =
                Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                          *Wrath =
and Kamodia still stand on the outside of the Maximal base* Wrath: HEEEEYYY=
Y!! WE WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the top of his lungs* *Than he notices=
 Kamodia walking away* Wrath: Where are you going? Kamodia: I'm not stickin=
g around here when they don't want us. Wrath: How do you know that they don=
't? Kamodia: If they really wanted us than they'd answer us. *Kamodia turns=
 and walks on looking for another base* *Wrath stands there thinking about =
what Komodia said and comes to the fact that she's right* Wrath: Hey wait u=
p! *Wrath comes running up and catches up with Kamodia* Kamodia: What made =
you leave? *She says giving off a sly grin* Wrath: I came to the fact that =
I'm too good for that dump. Kamodia: Come on, admit it! I'm right. If they =
really wanted us then they would've answered us. *Wrath doesn't answer and =
keeps looking foward* Kamodia: Your just mad because you know I'm right but=
 you are right about that place being a dump. *They contiue walking on*
